title: If the land is within a prohibited distance (currently of seventy five meters) from the crest of the
clause_text: If the land is within a prohibited distance (currently of seventy five meters) from the crest of the outer parapet of the Armament Research and Development Establishment (ARDE), Range Pashan, Pune;
section: No piece of land shall be used as site for the construction of building,
